sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const NGODashboard = () => { // Mock data - in a real app, this would come from an API const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalPickups: 36, scheduledPickups: 3, peopleHelped: 750, totalKgCollected: 380, restaurantPartners: 12, }); const [nearbyDonations, setNearbyDonations] = useState([ { id: 1, restaurantName: 'Green Garden Restaurant', foodItems: 'Rice, Curry, Mixed Vegetables', quantity: '10 kg', distance: '2.5 km', expiryTime: '12 hours', pickupWindow: '18:00 - 20:00', isNew: true }, { id: 2, restaurantName: 'Sunshine Café', foodItems: 'Sandwiches, Pastries, Fruit Salad', quantity: '5 kg', distance: '3.2 km', expiryTime: '16 hours', pickupWindow: '19:00 - 21:00', isNew: true }, { id: 3, restaurantName: 'Royal Spice', foodItems: 'Bread, Pasta, Salad', quantity: '6 kg', distance: '4.1 km', expiryTime: '24 hours', pickupWindow: '20:00 - 22:00', isNew: false } ]); const [scheduledPickups, setScheduledPickups] = useState([ { id: 101, restaurantName: 'Flavor House', foodItems: 'Pizza, Pasta, Salads', quantity: '8 kg', pickupTime: '2023-06-15 18:30', address: '123 Main St, Eco City', contact: '+1 (555) 123-4567' }, { id: 102, restaurantName: 'Fresh Bites', foodItems: 'Wraps, Soups, Desserts', quantity: '6 kg', pickupTime: '2023-06-16 19:00', address: '456 Park Ave, Eco City', contact: '+1 (555) 987-6543' }, { id: 103, restaurantName: 'Urban Kitchen', foodItems: 'Rice, Curry, Breads', quantity: '12 kg', pickupTime: '2023-06-17 17:30', address: '789 Forest Lane, Eco City', contact: '+1 (555) 456-7890' } ]); return (

NGO Dashboard

Welcome back, NGO Name!

Browse Available Donations
{/* Stats Row */}
Total Collections

{stats.totalPickups}

12% from last month
People Helped

{stats.peopleHelped}

18% from last month
Restaurant Partners

{stats.restaurantPartners}

8% from last month
{/* Nearby Donations Section */}
Nearby Donations
{nearbyDonations.length > 0 ? (
{nearbyDonations.map(donation => (
{donation.isNew && (
New
)}
{donation.restaurantName}

Food Items: {donation.foodItems}

{donation.quantity} {donation.distance}
Expires in: {donation.expiryTime} {donation.pickupWindow}
))}
) : (
No nearby donations available at the moment. Check back later!
)}
View All Available Donations
{/* Scheduled Pickups Section */}
Scheduled Pickups
{scheduledPickups.length > 0 ? (
{scheduledPickups.map(pickup => ( ))}
Restaurant Food Items Quantity Pickup Time Address Actions
{pickup.restaurantName}
{pickup.contact}
 {pickup.foodItems} {pickup.quantity} {pickup.pickupTime} {pickup.address}
) : (
No scheduled pickups. Browse available donations to schedule pickups.
)}
); }; export default NGODashboard;
